title: The Pillar of Salt
description: Originally published in 1953 (in English in 1955), The Pillar of Salt the semi-autobiographical novel about a young boy growing up in French colonized Tunisia. To gain access to privileged French society, he must reject his many identities â€“ Jew, Arab, and African. But, on the eve of World War II, he is forced to come to terms with his loyalties and his past.
author: Albert Memmi
